about_the_game:
A simple town tileset for RPG Maker, wrapped in winter. Includes regular and ruined versions of the tiles! Swap between tilesets to change the story of your village!

The snow town tileset includes (in regular and ruined versions):

Ground tiles:

water tiles
grass and dirt tiles
wood floor
2 red rugs
6 neutral tile patterns
cobblestone path
bush and tall grass
table
fence
and more

Wall Tiles:

woven wall pattern
2 white walls with wood trim
roofs with shadow side tiles

Also includes:

Interior tiles:

Custom furniture units – includes shelves, cabinets, countertop, and drawers, with lots of accessories to place on shelves.
Straw beds
Wood-frame beds in several styles
Curtains
Wall art, clocks and mirrors
Windows for different times of day/light situations
Bathroom furniture
Baskets with various vegetables
Kitchen furniture
Houseplants
and more!

Exterior tiles:

Custom bridges that can be used on land or water
Ladders, ropes, planks and simple walkways
Diagonal staircase
Barrels, pot, burlap sacks, and crates.
Extra roof tiles and chimney tiles
Shop signs
Vegetables and garden supplies
Lots of trees and decorative plants, including window planters
Gravestones
Ruined building exteriors – includes large chunks
and more!


Events and Animations

Doors, crates, barrel, and small fire animations!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
